revised_title: Investigating the Regeneration of Nerves and the Role of Neurilemmal Cells
tldr: This study investigates the process of nerve regeneration and the role of neurilemmal cells in the repair of divided nerves. The authors conclude that the axis cylinder, the essential part of a nerve fiber, has an exclusively central origin, and that the activity of neurilemmal cells is related to the development of new nerve fibers.
